MOVING.SERVICE.RESIDENTIAL.RATE.RULE.0: Rate for an additional mover is $40/hr/person
MOVING.SERVICE.RESIDENTIAL.RATE.RULE.1: Piano is subject to additional charges of CAD$100

MOVING.SERVICE.RESIDENTIAL.RATE.RULE.3: Refrigerator is subject to additional charges of CAD$60
MOVING.SERVICE.RESIDENTIAL.RATE.RULE.4: Any location 100km away from Toronto is subject to long-distance mileage charge
MOVING.SERVICE.RESIDENTIAL.RATE.RULE.5: Long distance move is subject to a min. 2 hrs loading time and a min. 2 hrs of unloading time.
